title: Спасская
overview: Anna Spasskaya is a Sochi Criminal Investigator, a blonde with a sharp mind and strong character. She is principled, not afraid to seem like a bore, not shy in front of her superiors, knows how to split a criminal and rein in her subordinates. The main thing is that in any complicated case he finds non-obvious versions and notices hidden details. As a professional, she is priceless. Insight Spasskaya inherited from her grandmother Inessa Arkadyevna. And in Anna's personal life, at first glance, everything is fine: a wealthy husband wears coffee to bed and begs to leave the dangerous job.
